name: Recycle Game (Lide Master)
description:
A mini recycling game, created using only AI-generated art!
Try to get as many points as possible before the timer runs out!
Your score will be saved in your browser's local storage.
Try to beat my score of 2810! 

Assets were created in MidJourney.
Game coded in JS, using Wick Editor.

Credits:
Programming: Me
Art: MidJourney

For any questions, don't hesitate to contact me.
If I'm not active on itch.io, feel free to DM me on Discord (hanzohAlani#2412) or contact me through IG (@StableAiXArt). 
Suggestions & feedback always appreciated :)
